name: AdminProfilesBonitaV1

text.value: Select how you want to add profiles.

A profile includes the mapping to entities of the organization.
Before you import profiles, the mapped organization must already be deployed.
When you import profiles, it overwrites any existing profiles with the same names.

placeholder.value: Click here to choose your .xml file.

text.value: There are no users mapped to this profile

description: This page provides the list of a profiles. It is dedicated to Admin-like profiles. You can export it and edit it in the UI Designer.
